ClipboardWriteText.summary:
The interface's writeText()
property writes the specified text string to the system clipboard. Text may be read back
using either or {{domxref("Clipboard.readText",
"readText()")}}.

remarks.para:
-Clipboard API
-Async Clipboard API demo on Glitch
-Image support for Async Clipboard article

ClipboardWriteText.returns:
A which is resolved once the clipboard's contents have been
updated. The promise is rejected if the caller does not have permission to write to the
clipboard.
